description:
Dulwich Prep London is ditching Native American tribe names for mythical creatures in its house system over concerns of "cultural appropriation".

The post Prep School Drops Native American Names for Fear of “Cultural Appropriation” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Prep School Drops Native American Names for Fear of “Cultural Appropriation”

description:
"Plus-size inclusivity training" is being provided by theatres and drama schools to combat "fatphobia" and make room for bigger bodies on the stage.

The post Arts Schools Offered “Plus-Size Inclusivity Training” to Tackle “Fatphobia” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Arts Schools Offered “Plus-Size Inclusivity Training” to Tackle “Fatphobia”

description:
Labour faces accusations of intending to raise council tax on homes with larger gardens by using satellite surveillance to spy on property sizes, should the party come into power.

The post Tories Claim Starmer Will Increase Council Tax on Homes With Gardens appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Tories Claim Starmer Will Increase Council Tax on Homes With Gardens

description:
DJ Liz Kershaw has slammed pro-Palestinian activists for jeopardising summer festivals by pressuring Barclays to withdraw vital sponsorship over its links to Israel.

The post Fears for U.K. Music Festivals After Sponsor Barclays Caves In to Gaza Protesters appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Fears for U.K. Music Festivals After Sponsor Barclays Caves In to Gaza Protesters

description:
A new investigation reveals the US military spread anti-vaccine propaganda in the Philippines during the COVID-19 pandemic, using fake accounts to undermine China and cast doubt on the safety of Chinese vaccines.

The post Pentagon Ran Secret Anti-Vaccine Campaign to Undermine China During COVID-19 Pandemic appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Pentagon Ran Secret Anti-Vaccine Campaign to Undermine China During COVID-19 Pandemic

description:
It's been dubbed the immigration election, but it seems the Tories and Labour haven't heard. Neither party seems serious about tackling this major source of public anger, says Migration Watch's Alp Mehmet.

The post The Immigration Election? It Seems the Conservatives and Labour Haven’t Heard appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Immigration Election? It Seems the Conservatives and Labour Haven’t Heard

description:
A concerned teacher has done a deep dive into a pro-refugee charity that has embedded itself in 400 British schools and appears to be in clear breach of the rules prohibiting the promotion of partisan political views.

The post How a Pro-Refugee Lobby Group Embedded Itself in England’s Schools appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: How a Pro-Refugee Lobby Group Embedded Itself in England’s Schools

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
